Where can I get peer node information?
Hi there - thanks for the report. can you share your besu configuration or command line parameters with me?

There's some helpful info for peering in the besu docs https://besu.hyperledger.org/public-networks/how-to/troubleshoot/peering

Also maybe useful - if you enable the ADMIN RPC api, you can use this call to view detailed peer info
 https://besu.hyperledger.org/public-networks/reference/api#admin_peers
